Created an attachment (id=18258)
test xml files

Open the Catalogue.xml and you should see this error.

It looks like the reason this Stack overflow was happening is because the file
Test.xsd includes itself.

Using the graphical editor when I set the element "Mark" to be of type
"MarkType" the include was automatically added in.  Also, it looks like the
source of the bug is actually org.eclipse.xsd not WST.
Keith can you investigate and move this to the 'XSD' project if required?
This problem appears to be fixed now.
This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP bugs which are in the resolved state without an appropriate targeted version.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.
